publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-467 Mr Jim Wallace: Creating an Enterprise Culture in Scotland's Schools—That the Parliament welcomes the "can do, will do" attitude the Scottish Executive’s strategy for enterprise in education aims to engender among young people; notes that it is a priority of the Partnership Agreement to deliver the strategy in partnership with local authorities and businesses, and looks forward to the Determined to Succeed strategy giving young people the skills they need to take an entrepreneurial spirit from the classroom into a confident and prosperous Scotland. Supported by: Peter Peacock*, Lewis Macdonald*, Euan Robson*
